actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To repeal the exception for certain technical personnel from provisions relating to the determination of whether individuals are employees for purposes of the employment taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1986 to repeal the provision which disallows the treatment of certain technical personnel as self-employed individuals for employment tax purposes.

titles.title: To repeal the exception for certain technical personnel from provisions relating to the determination of whether individuals are employees for purposes of the employment taxes.
